What build are you using?
What are your 2 project names?

oh sorry :-)

i was using build 20020412, and i tried to rename a project from 'toldskat' 
to 'toldskat_udv'

i have a thought about what it might be... perhaps you should look at what 
happends if you try to build a project if the classpath is not set properly... 
i get over 15000 errors and warnings, and perhaps there is an overflow 
somewhere.... ive had odd problems before, and they all stem from trying to set 
up a project in a new version of eclipse.

in the case of renaming the project, i suspect that i had gotten it imported 
but not compiled, and when i renamed the project, it recompiled and threw the 
error... just a thought

Unable to reproduce.  I created a project with > 6300 java files, and I was able 
to both rename and move the project, both from the navigator and packages view.

However, I was unable to compile a project that large (with many errors).  I 
left it for 30 minutes and it still had not compiled everything.  However, I 
never got any error messages, it was just taking forever.

Was the problem reproducible?

Closing, not able to reproduce.

If you can still reproduce, please reopen and attach complete log contents.
